name: Space harvest (itch) (yompyamper)
description:
Your space station was destroyed by unknown lifeforms!

Eliminate them as you try to find a usable rocket to re-enter the earthen atmosphere and land.

Be careful, because your oxygen is running out!

WASD / ZQSD / arrow keys to move

Left-click to attack - This destroys the enemies AND the projectiles.

Right-click to boost your speed in space

Spacebar to wind up your tether and get pulled back to the platform

Picking up hearts gives you an extra life (What, really? I wouldn't have guessed), and picking up bubbles refills some of your oxygen.

To finish a level, you need to eliminate all the enemies, then return to any platform.

You can die if you get shot with no more lives, or by running out of oxygen with no more lives (zero oxygen consumes a heart and gives you some oxygen).

That took waaaaaaay longer than I expected, but all in all, I've been creating new classes that I can use for future projects! (I wonder where the sound design went...)

I challenge you to play till the end, and as usual, another game next week :)
